publication.title: Super high definition image (WHD: Wide/Double HD) transmission system
Maximum Mutual Information of Space-Time Block Codes with Symbolwise Decodability
publication.keyword: Error Probability;Maximum Likelihood Decoding;Space Time Block Code;Upper Bound;Maximum Mutual Information;
publication.abstract: In this paper, we analyze the performance of space-time block codes which enable symbolwise maximum likeli- hood decoding. We derive an upper bound of maximum mutual information (MMI) on space-time block codes that enable symbolwise maximum likelihood decoding for a frequency non-selective quasi-static fading chan- nel. MMI is an upper bound on how much one can send information with vanishing
